title: Lisa Ballantyne ND, LMP
description: Visit findatopdoc.com for all information on Lisa Ballantyne ND, LMP, Naturopathic Physician in Gig Harbor, Washington, 98335. Profile, Reviews, Appointments, Insurances.
cleaned_text: Lisa Ballantyne ND, LMP Naturopathic Physician3007 Judson Street [Show map](#) About Dr. Lisa Ballantyne is a naturopathic physician practicing in Gig Harbor, Washington. Dr. Ballantyne specializes in proactive prevention and treatment. Dr. Ballantyne combines holistic healing methods with traditional solutions to medical illness. Providing both individual and family care, the most common ailments treated are allergies, chronic pain, digestive issues, obesity, heart disease, fertility, menopause, cancer and chronic fatigue syndrome. Naturopathic Physicians place a strong emphasis on natural remedies that add to the broad spectrum of remedies available.
